sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of insufficient body liquids and blood losing their moistening and nourishing functions. Pu ji fang 普濟方 207: 痢，則津液空竭，臟腑虛燥 , “As a result of free-flux illness the body liquids are exhausted and the depots and palaces have depletion desiccation ”.

②Hollow and desiccated pharmaceutical substances. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry huo xiang 藿香 quotes Fan ye he xiang fang Miscellaneous contents. Southern 范曄合香方 Dynasties Song, 5th century. : 零藿虛燥。古人乃以合熏香 , “ Ling huo is hollow and desiccated . The ancients used it for preparing incense”.
